Text: its shame they only took a picture of the shittest part of the world

I guess they just photographed whatever met their lenses. ;)

Anyway, I forgot to mention the actual resolution: 16384x8192 pixels.
The entire world is never at night at the same time, even during an eclipse.

You're not so easy to cheat ;)

Also, there is no camera lens large enough to capture the Earth from all angles at once. But I *THINK* there are means to come around these problems. ;)
Thanks very much --- will really enjoy this no matter what part of the world is viewed.
